alert.note: Alert for Sheridan (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 14 at 4:32PM CDT until July 14 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 PM MDT FOR CENTRAL SHERIDAN COUNTY... At 331 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles south of Rushville, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Rushville, Lone Butte, Highway 27 crossing the Niobrara River, Smith Lake State Wildlife Management Area, Highway 250 crossing the Niobrara River and Walgren Lake State Recreation Area. This includes the following highways... Highway 20 between mile markers 81 and 97. Highway 250 between mile markers 25 and 48. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
